resources.string: The following apps are supported by Mastodon Redirect. You can choose which one should be launched when handling supported links.

To use Mastodon Redirect, you\'ll need to enable all supported links in Settings or use Shizuku to do it automatically. Note: Settings may be unable to open the App Info for Mastodon Redirect, in which case Shizuku will be required.
Install the Shizuku app and follow the instructions in it to set it up. Then come back here and try again.
